name: 3dEigsToDT
author: AFNI Developers
description: Convert set of DTI eigenvectors and eigenvalues to a diffusion tensor, with optional value-scaling and vector-flipping.

inputs.description: Searchable descriptor for finding all three required eigenvalue files. It should list all three eigenvalue files in descending order of magnitude.
inputs.name: Eigenvalue Files Descriptor

inputs.description: Searchable descriptor for finding all three required eigenvector files. It should list all three eigenvector files in order matching the eigenvalue files.
inputs.name: Eigenvector Files Descriptor

inputs.description: Prefix for the output file name. It is recommended to include a 'DT' label in it.
inputs.name: Output File Prefix

inputs.description: Optional mask within which to calculate uncertainty. If not provided, the data should be masked already.
inputs.name: Mask File

inputs.description: Change sign of the first element of eigenvectors.
inputs.name: Flip X

inputs.description: Change sign of the second element of eigenvectors.
inputs.name: Flip Y

inputs.description: Change sign of the third element of eigenvectors.
inputs.name: Flip Z

inputs.description: Rescale the eigenvalues by dividing by a number X > 0.
inputs.name: Scale Eigenvalues

output-files.description: Output diffusion tensor (DT) file in AFNI format (BRIK)
output-files.name: Output DT BRIK File

output-files.description: Output diffusion tensor (DT) file in AFNI format (HEAD)
output-files.name: Output DT HEAD File
